Let me Google this for you……..: in: Music, Themes, Season 3, and 4 more Hello Friends Edit Comments (1) Share  Hello Friends is the theme song of the third and fourth seasons of Pororo the Little Penguin. In Season 5, Season 6, and the HD version of Season 1, it is named Hello Everyone. It is similar and has the same tune, but with different lyrics.
